content: Every LP I speak with these days tells me, “We need to have coverage in Los Angeles — we know that” and it’s no coincidence that we’ve seen the explosion in emerging managers covering the Seed and A-round investment scene in LA. They always ask whether I see this as threatening as Upfront Ventures. “Are you kidding me? Having more great investors is critical to more entrepreneurs staying in LA, which is critical to my long-term success!”
